Package shared.model.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    A class that represents the clients game.
    MessageList  
    Password  
    PlayerName  
    ScoreKeeper
    This class keeps track of the score of every user.
    TradeManager
    This class manages the trades between user-user and user-port
    TradeOffer
    This class represents a trade offer
    TurnManager
    The manager that keeps track of the user's turn
    User
    This class represent a user for playing games and authenticating as well
    UserManager
    UserManger class manages the users and can change the player list, tell whose turn it is, and cycle through turns
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TurnPhase
    The phase of the turn represented by the enumeration: ROLLING, ROBBING, PLAYING, DISCARDING, FIRSTROUND, SECONDROUND
